About

Technology & Financial consulting services for clients in financial, academic, healthcare, telecommunications, and non-profit sectors. We help our clients achieve objectives and reduce cost with cloud-based solutions, digitized process transformation, process automation, and through the development of quantitative decision methods.

Gain an Edge with Fallbrook...

  • Cloud services design & implementation
  • Factor Analytics for Sector Rotation Trends
  • Beta Hedging & Risk-reduction Strategies
  • Valuation models

Let us help you securely transform, optimize, and manage your processes in the the cloud. Fallbrook provides design & implementation support for cloud-managed processes & data pipelines. We can help to leverage your with quantitative methods to identify opportunities & mitigate risks.
